org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades

Class ThreadBoundBladeBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.BladeBase
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.ThreadBoundBladeBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Blade, ThreadBoundBlade

    @GwtIncompatible
public class ThreadBoundBladeBase
extends BladeBase
implements ThreadBoundBlade

    All the requests and responses of a thread-bound blade are processed on the single thread to which the reactor is bound.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.BladeBase

      Constructor and Description
      ThreadBoundBladeBase()
